title: Liang Yuhao
text:
Liang Yuhao (, born 3 March 1993 in <a href="Shaoguan">Shaoguan</a>) is a <a href="China">Chinese</a>-born <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a> professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who last played as a <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> for <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Premier%20League">Hong Kong Premier League</a> club <a href="Eastern%20Sports%20Club">Eastern</a>. He is currently a free agent.
Club career.
In 2011, Liang came from <a href="Guangdong">Guangdong</a> to <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a>, had training with <a href="Hong%20Kong%20First%20Division%20League">Hong Kong First Division League</a> club <a href="Tai%20Po%20FC">Wofoo Tai Po</a>, but he couldn't get into the first team during that season.
In 2012, Liang signed for <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Second%20Division%20League">Hong Kong Second Division League</a> club <a href="Wanchai%20SF">Wanchai</a>.
In 2012, Liang was loaning to <a href="Hong%20Kong%20First%20Division%20League">Hong Kong First Division League</a> club <a href="South%20China%20AA">South China</a>.
In 2013, Liang returned to <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Second%20Division%20League">Hong Kong Second Division League</a> club <a href="Tai%20Po%20FC">Tai Po</a>, and helped them to promoted to <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Premier%20League">Hong Kong Premier League</a> in 2014.
In 2015, Liang signed for <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Premier%20League">Hong Kong Premier League</a> club <a href="Eastern%20Sports%20Club">Eastern</a>.
On 7 May 2016, Liang made his HKPL debut for Eastern against <a href="Kitchee">Kitchee</a>, which the match lost 0–2.
In 2019, Liang played 2 consecutive matches for Eastern as the first choice goalkeeper and he managed to keep a clean sheet against <a href="Dreams%20Sports%20Club">Dreams FC</a> in Sapling Cup.
In July 2019, Liang was released by Eastern.
International career.
After 4 years staying at <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a>, Liang became a local player, he could represent <a href="Hong%20Kong%20national%20football%20team">Hong Kong national football team</a>.
On 27 March 2015, in <a href="2016%20AFC%20U-23%20Championship%20qualification">2016 AFC U-23 Championship qualification</a> Group F, Liang first represented <a href="Hong%20Kong%20national%20under-23%20football%20team">Hong Kong U-23</a> against <a href="Australia%20national%20under-23%20soccer%20team">Australia U-23</a>, which Hong Kong lost 0:6.
